title: Lego Graphic Novel - Mr. Amperduke (2006)
description:
Told without words through over 2,000 panels, Mister Amperduke is an epic, fast paced and dark adventure that offers a new mode of graphic storytelling.
Amperville is a miniature LEGO city that Mister Amperduke builds and maintains as a hobby.
The tiny LEGO people live a blissful life in their manufactured utopia until Mister AmperdukeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s grandson drops a Nechradon into their world.
Mr. Amperduke is hospitalised while the vicious monster unleashes a devastating rampage on his model society.
The citizens are helpless as the monster destroys everything.
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a race against time as their benevolent master struggles to return home through his injury and bad traffic while the giant insect relentlessly devours the trapped citizens.
Blood is spilled and leaders emergeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
But there is a secret weapon lying in wait and ready to do battleÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
The whole book uses no words, the reader is involved in a different way than a normal Graphic Novel. There are hidden stories and details waiting to be discovered by the reader.
Written and Drawn by Bob Byrne
